bacci.giovanni.bio.sequencing

Class FastaSequenceWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacci.giovanni.bio.sequencing.FastaSequenceWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SequenceWriter

    public class FastaSequenceWriter
extends Object
implements SequenceWriter
    Writer able to write a sequence and ad id into a file respecting the fasta format. This is a wrapper class for a BufferedWriter.
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci

    • Method Detail

      • writeSequence

        public void writeSequence(String id,
                 String sequence)
                   throws IOException
        Main method that write a sequence in a sequence file. The sequence will be cleaned using the FrequencyPullStreamer.cleanSequence(String) method.

        Parameters:

        sequence - the sequence
